com.blackshark.gamesdk

Class GameEventInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blackshark.gamesdk.GameEventInterface

  • public class GameEventInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    BlackShark Gaming Phone has rich vibration, lighting effects.
    GameEventInterface is provided for Game vendor.
    Blackshark team will customize a set of vibration & light effects for your game's dedicated use.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameEventInterface() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int notifyEvent(int eventId)
      call this method When an action/event occurs in the game, device will perform corresponding light effect and vibration.
      static int notifyScene(int sceneId)
      call this method When entering an specific scene, device will perform corresponding light effect and vibration.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameEventInterface

        public GameEventInterface()

    • Method Detail

      • notifyEvent

        public static int notifyEvent(int eventId)
        call this method When an action/event occurs in the game, device will perform corresponding light effect and vibration.
        The actions/events are defined by Game vendor, like following table.
        Blackshark team will customize light effect and vibration.
        actions/events are different for each game.
        Here is an example of a MOBA game:
        event id description
        1 attack
        2 flash
        11 skill 1
        12 skill 2
        13 skill 3
        …… ……
        Parameters:
        eventId - id of event
        Returns:
        returns 0 if success, non-0 errorcode for errors.

      • notifyScene

        public static int notifyScene(int sceneId)
        call this method When entering an specific scene, device will perform corresponding light effect and vibration.
        The scenes are defined by Game vendor, like following talbe.
        Blackshark team will customize light effect and vibration.
        scenes are different for each game.
        Here is an example of a MOBA game:
        scene id description
        1 Welcome to Summoner's Rift!
        2 You have slain an enemy
        3 An enemy has been slain
        4 You have been slain
        5 An ally has been slain
        …… ……
        Parameters:
        sceneId - id of scene
        Returns:
        returns 0 if success, non-0 errorcode for errors.
